articles.description: The two leading U.S. COVID-19 vaccines use new technology developed to avoid use of embryonic stem cells—and trial participants hope the shots’ safety will encourage other Americans to get them
articles.content: ABOUT HALF OF AMERICANS said they would take the coronavirus vaccine, according to a recent survey from the Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research. Forty percent of black respondent… [+3944 chars]

articles.author: Carlos R. Munoz, Sarasota Herald-Tribune
articles.title: Sarasota Memorial receives first allocation of Moderna vaccine - Sarasota Herald-Tribune
articles.description: Sarasota Memorial Hospital received 9,600 doses of the COVID-19 Moderna Vaccine Tuesday, one of only 173 state hospitals to receive the drug.
articles.content:
Carlos R. Munoz | Sarasota Herald-Tribune

articles.title: Texas hospital workers turned down the vaccine -- so a senator and a cop got it instead - Raw Story
